data.actual_result: The channel name and any buttons that should be there are gone
data.expected_result: Buttons and channels names are there off the get go (but they aren't)
data.short_description: Channel headers, and other buttons are gone in 713
data.steps_to_repro: - Have light theme enabled first (for immediate result) - install 713 - open Discord and notice that the "friends" tab doesn't say friends or have any visible buttons - if you swap to light theme, close Discord and leave it for 5 minutes or so you'll get the same result. Switching channels seems to fix this bug
